get.description: Gets the current Unity Version being used

message.description: The message returned by the server

result.description: The result of the server response

UnityVersion.description: The current Unity Version being used

post.description: Creates a new user

requestBody.description: Information required to create a user

username.description: The username to create an account. Must be only letters and numbers, and ONE underscore allowed.

password.description: The password to use on the new account. Must contain at least one lowercase and uppercase letter, one number, and one special character.

email.description: The email to use on the new account. Must be a valid email.

inviteCode.description: The provided invite code. Check if required with /isInviteCodeRequired

message.description: The message returned by the server

result.description: The result of the server response

post.description: Checks to see if a user exists by UserId

requestBody.description: Information required to check if a user exists

message.description: The message returned by the server

result.description: The result of the server response

post.description: Gets a user by either their username or userid. If a token is provided, then the private UserData is returned

requestBody.description: Information required to check if a user exists

message.description: The message returned by the server

result.description: The result of the server response

UserData.description: The returned UserData. Private if a valid token was provided

post.description: Logs a user into their account by giving them an account token

requestBody.description: The information required to login

app.description: The app that is logging in

username.description: The username of the account being logged in to

message.description: The message returned by the server

result.description: The result of the server response

LoginResult.description: The LoginResult. 0 - Incorrect, 1 - Missing2FA, 2 - Banned, 3 - Warned, 4 - Correct.

WarnStatus.description: If present, then the user has received a warning. This should be displayed.

BanStatus.description: If present, then the user has been banned. No token will be given and the ban note should be displayed.

token.description: The created token to be used for authentication

post.description: Logs a user out by invalidating a valid token.

requestBody.description: The information required to logout

message.description: The message returned by the server

result.description: The result of the server response

requestBody.description: Information required to check a token is valid

message.description: The message returned by the server

result.description: The result of the server response

isValidToken.description: The returned UserData. Private if a valid token was provided

post.description: Updates a user's bio

requestBody.description: Information required to update a bio

PfpURL.description: The URL for a profile picture (restrictions configurable by server)

BannerURL.description: The URL for a profile banner (restrictions configurable by server)

DisplayName.description: An optional Display Name for a user

Pronouns.description: Either an object to define set, or "remove" to remove pronouns

nominativeId.description: The id for the nominative pronoun

accusativeId.description: The id for the accusative pronoun

reflexiveId.description: The id for the reflexive pronoun

independentId.description: The id for an independent pronoun

dependentId.description: The id for a dependent pronoun

DisplayThree.description: Whether or not to display three pronoun cases instead of two (such as He/Him/Himself)

firstCase.description: The first case id to be shown

secondCase.description: The second case id to be shown

thirdCase.description: The third case id to be shown

post.description: Uploads an allowed file to the server

requestBody.description: Information required to upload a file

file.description: The file being uploaded (from a form)

avatarMeta.description: The avatarMeta if the upload is an avatar

Publicity.description: The publicity of an avatar represented as an integer from 0-1

ImageURL.description: The Image URL for an avatar

BuildPlatform.description: The BuildPlatform for the file being uploaded along with the avatarMeta

Id.description: The Id of an existing avatar being overwritten or added to

worldMeta.description: The worldMeta if the upload is a world

Publicity.description: The publicity of an world represented as an integer from 0-1

ThumbnailURL.description: The Thumbnail URL for a world

IconURLs.description: An array of Image URLs as icons for a world

ServerScripts.description: An array of Script URLs as ServerScripts for a world

Id.description: The Id of an existing world being overwritten or added to

result.description: The result of the server response

post.description: Uploads part of an allowed file to the server

requestBody.description: Information required to upload part of a file

file.description: The file being uploaded (from a form)

chunkNumber.description: The current chunk of a part to upload

amountOfChunks.description: The total amount of chunks as calculated by the client

chunkId.description: The assigned upload part id given after the first chunk is uploaded

avatarMeta.description: The avatarMeta if the upload is an avatar

Publicity.description: The publicity of an avatar represented as an integer from 0-1

ImageURL.description: The Image URL for an avatar

BuildPlatform.description: The BuildPlatform for the file being uploaded along with the avatarMeta

Id.description: The Id of an existing avatar being overwritten or added to

worldMeta.description: The worldMeta if the upload is a world

BuildPlatform.description: The BuildPlatform for the file being uploaded along with the worldMeta

Id.description: The Id of an existing world being overwritten or added to

result.description: The result of the server response

chunkNumber.description: The next chunk number as calculated by the server
